short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track live competitive programming contests and user rankings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CP Tracker is a Chrome extension that helps competitive programmers track their progress across popular coding platforms, such as LeetCode, Codeforces, and CodeChef. With CP Tracker, users can conveniently add their usernames, view their current ratings, titles, and live rankings, and toggle details for easy monitoringâ€”all from one unified interface.
